event.description: Ben Revere singles on a line drive to right fielder Cody Ross.
Tsuyoshi Nishioka flies out to left fielder Darnell McDonald.
With Rene Tosoni batting, Ben Revere steals (1) 2nd base.
Rene Tosoni flies out to right fielder Cody Ross. Ben Revere to 3rd.
Aaron Bates grounds out, third baseman Will Middlebrooks to first baseman Adrian Gonzalez.
Luke Hughes grounds out, shortstop Mike Aviles to first baseman Adrian Gonzalez.
Sean Burroughs walks.
With Ray Chang batting, Sean Burroughs caught stealing 2nd base, catcher Jarrod Saltalamacchia to second baseman Dustin Pedroia.
Ray Chang walks.
With Rene Rivera batting, Ray Chang steals (1) 2nd base.
Rene Rivera grounds out, catcher Jarrod Saltalamacchia to first baseman Adrian Gonzalez.
Pitcher Change: Andrew Miller replaces Josh Beckett.
Darin Mastroianni walks.
Ben Revere strikes out swinging.
Tsuyoshi Nishioka strikes out swinging. Darin Mastroianni steals (1) 2nd base.
Rene Tosoni called out on strikes.
Aaron Bates grounds out, third baseman Will Middlebrooks to first baseman Adrian Gonzalez.
Luke Hughes flies out to center fielder Jacoby Ellsbury.
Sean Burroughs grounds out, second baseman Dustin Pedroia to first baseman Adrian Gonzalez.
Pitcher Change: Mark Melancon replaces Andrew Miller.
Defensive Substitution: Kelly Shoppach replaces catcher Jarrod Saltalamacchia, batting 6th, playing catcher.
Ray Chang singles on a fly ball to center fielder Jacoby Ellsbury.
Rene Rivera singles on a line drive to left fielder Darnell McDonald. Ray Chang to 2nd.
Darin Mastroianni out on a sacrifice bunt, third baseman Will Middlebrooks to second baseman Dustin Pedroia. Ray Chang to 3rd. Rene Rivera to 2nd.
Ben Revere grounds out, third baseman Will Middlebrooks to first baseman Adrian Gonzalez. Ray Chang scores. Rene Rivera to 3rd.
Tsuyoshi Nishioka flies out to left fielder Darnell McDonald.
Defensive Substitution: Oscar Tejeda replaces second baseman Dustin Pedroia, batting 1st, playing second base.
Defensive Substitution: Che-Hsuan Lin replaces center fielder Jacoby Ellsbury, batting 2nd, playing center field.
Defensive Substitution: Josh Kroeger replaces first baseman Adrian Gonzalez, batting 4th, playing right field.
Defensive Substitution: Lars Anderson replaces right fielder Cody Ross, batting 3rd, playing first base.
Defensive Substitution: Pedro Ciriaco replaces shortstop Mike Aviles, batting 5th, playing shortstop.
Defensive Substitution: Alex Hassan replaces left fielder Darnell McDonald, batting 7th, playing left field.
Nate Spears remains in the game as the third baseman.
Pitcher Change: Justin Thomas replaces Mark Melancon.
Rene Tosoni grounds out, second baseman Oscar Tejeda to first baseman Lars Anderson.
Aaron Bates called out on strikes.
Luke Hughes called out on strikes.
Defensive Substitution: Jose Iglesias replaces catcher Kelly Shoppach, batting 6th, playing shortstop.
Defensive Substitution: Ryan Lavarnway replaces shortstop Pedro Ciriaco, batting 5th, playing catcher.
Pitcher Change: Tony Pena replaces Justin Thomas.
Sean Burroughs doubles (1) on a ground ball to right fielder Josh Kroeger.
Ray Chang walks.
Danny Lehmann strikes out swinging.
Darin Mastroianni grounds into a force out, shortstop Jose Iglesias to second baseman Oscar Tejeda. Sean Burroughs to 3rd. Ray Chang out at 2nd. Darin Mastroianni to 1st.
Ben Revere singles on a ground ball to right fielder Josh Kroeger. Sean Burroughs scores. Darin Mastroianni to 3rd.
With Tsuyoshi Nishioka batting, Darin Mastroianni caught stealing home, pitcher Tony Pena to first baseman Lars Anderson to shortstop Jose Iglesias to catcher Ryan Lavarnway.
Jason Repko remains in the game as the designated hitter.
Pitcher Change: Scott Atchison replaces Tony Pena.
Tsuyoshi Nishioka strikes out swinging.
Wilkin Ramirez grounds out, third baseman Nate Spears to first baseman Lars Anderson.
Aaron Bates singles on a ground ball to left fielder Alex Hassan.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Daniel Rams replaces Luke Hughes.
Daniel Rams grounds into a force out, third baseman Nate Spears to second baseman Oscar Tejeda. Aaron Bates out at 2nd.
Sean Burroughs called out on strikes.
Mike Hollimon walks.
Danny Lehmann pops out to catcher Ryan Lavarnway in foul territory.
Darin Mastroianni doubles (1) on a fly ball to center fielder Che-Hsuan Lin. Mike Hollimon scores.
Ben Revere walks.
Tsuyoshi Nishioka flies out to left fielder Alex Hassan.
Dustin Pedroia walks.
Jacoby Ellsbury lines into unassisted double play, first baseman Aaron Bates. Dustin Pedroia doubled off 1st.
Cody Ross strikes out swinging.
Adrian Gonzalez flies out to right fielder Rene Tosoni.
Mike Aviles singles on a line drive to left fielder Ben Revere.
With Jarrod Saltalamacchia batting, Mike Aviles caught stealing 2nd base, catcher Rene Rivera to second baseman Ray Chang.
Jarrod Saltalamacchia strikes out swinging.
Pitcher Change: Jared Burton replaces Francisco Liriano.
Darnell McDonald flies out to center fielder Darin Mastroianni.
Will Middlebrooks grounds out, second baseman Ray Chang to first baseman Aaron Bates.
Juan Carlos Linares grounds out, third baseman Sean Burroughs to first baseman Aaron Bates.
Pitcher Change: Phil Dumatrait replaces Jared Burton.
Dustin Pedroia doubles (1) on a line drive to right fielder Rene Tosoni.
Jacoby Ellsbury lines out to right fielder Rene Tosoni.
Cody Ross walks.

Adrian Gonzalez reaches on fielding error by third baseman Sean Burroughs. Cody Ross to 3rd. Adrian Gonzalez to 2nd. Dustin Pedroia out at home, shortstop Tsuyoshi Nishioka to catcher Rene Rivera to pitcher Phil Dumatrait to catcher Rene Rivera.
Mike Aviles singles on a line drive to center fielder Darin Mastroianni. Cody Ross scores. Adrian Gonzalez scores.
Jarrod Saltalamacchia grounds out, second baseman Ray Chang to first baseman Aaron Bates.
Pitcher Change: Esmerling Vasquez replaces Phil Dumatrait.
Darnell McDonald flies out to left fielder Ben Revere.
Will Middlebrooks singles on a line drive to left fielder Ben Revere.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch runner Nate Spears replaces Will Middlebrooks.
Juan Carlos Linares singles on a line drive to left fielder Ben Revere. Nate Spears to 2nd.
With Dustin Pedroia batting, Nate Spears advances to 3rd on a balk. Juan Carlos Linares advances to 2nd on a balk.
Dustin Pedroia called out on strikes.
Jacoby Ellsbury lines out to first baseman Aaron Bates.
Defensive Substitution: Wilkin Ramirez replaces right fielder Rene Tosoni, batting 3rd, playing right field.
Defensive Substitution: Danny Lehmann replaces catcher Rene Rivera, batting 8th, playing catcher.
Pitcher Change: Kyle Waldrop replaces Esmerling Vasquez.
Lars Anderson singles on a line drive to center fielder Darin Mastroianni.
Josh Kroeger flies out to center fielder Darin Mastroianni.
Pedro Ciriaco flies out to right fielder Wilkin Ramirez.
With Kelly Shoppach batting, wild pitch by Kyle Waldrop, Lars Anderson to 2nd.
Kelly Shoppach strikes out swinging.
Defensive Substitution: Mike Hollimon replaces second baseman Ray Chang, batting 7th, playing second base.
Pitcher Change: Jason Bulger replaces Kyle Waldrop.
Alex Hassan walks.
With Nate Spears batting, Alex Hassan steals (1) 2nd base.
Nate Spears walks.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Jason Repko replaces Juan Carlos Linares.
Jason Repko out on a sacrifice bunt, third baseman Sean Burroughs to first baseman Aaron Bates. Alex Hassan to 3rd. Nate Spears to 2nd.
Oscar Tejeda walks.
Che-Hsuan Lin walks. Alex Hassan scores. Nate Spears to 3rd. Oscar Tejeda to 2nd.
Lars Anderson hits a grand slam (1) to right field. Nate Spears scores. Oscar Tejeda scores. Che-Hsuan Lin scores.
Josh Kroeger singles on a line drive to right fielder Wilkin Ramirez.
Pitcher Change: Daryl Thompson replaces Jason Bulger.
With Ryan Lavarnway batting, Josh Kroeger steals (1) 2nd base.
Ryan Lavarnway pops out to third baseman Sean Burroughs in foul territory.
Jose Iglesias flies out to center fielder Darin Mastroianni.
Daniel Rams remains in the game as the designated hitter.
Alex Hassan walks.
Nate Spears flies out to right fielder Wilkin Ramirez.
Jason Repko grounds out, pitcher Daryl Thompson to first baseman Aaron Bates. Alex Hassan to 2nd.
Oscar Tejeda triples (1) on a fly ball to center fielder Darin Mastroianni. Alex Hassan scores.
Che-Hsuan Lin pops out to third baseman Sean Burroughs in foul territory.
